TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationDescription extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("Name={name}, IsInitiating={isInitiating}, IsTerminating={isTerminating}")

summary.span: 表示合約作業的描述，提供組成作業的訊息的描述。

span.span: Represents the description of a contract operation that provides a description of the messages that make up the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 合約是作業的集合，指定端點給外界進行通訊。A Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) contract is a collection of operations that specifies what the endpoint communicates to the outside world. 每個作業都是訊息交換。Each operation is a message exchange. 例如，一個要求訊息和一個關聯的回覆訊息即形成一個要求/回覆訊息交換。For example, a request message and an associated reply message forming a request/reply message exchange. 物件是用於描述合約和其作業。A object is used to describe contracts and their operations. 在 中，每個合約作業都有對應的 ，描述作業的各個部分，例如作業是單向作業或要求/回覆作業。Within a , each contract operation has a corresponding that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply. 每個 也會使用 物件的集合來描述組成作業的訊息。Each also describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of objects. 包含使用程式設計模型定義合約之介面的參考。 contains a reference to an interface that defines the contract using the programming model. 這個介面是以 標示，而其對應至端點作業的方法是以 標示。This interface is marked with , and its methods that correspond to endpoint operations are marked with . 許多上的屬性對 WCF 程式設計模型中對應的屬性，例如。Many of the properties on have corresponding properties in the WCF programming model on , for example, . ## Examples 下列範例會使用所傳回的集合傳回屬性類別。The following example uses the returned from the collection returned by the property of the class. 此程式碼會逐一查看端點的集合，並列印每個端點名稱以及端點中每個作業的名稱。The code iterates through the collection of endpoints and prints each endpoint name, as well as the name of each operation in the endpoint. [!code-csharp[DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractserializeroperationbehavior/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractserializeroperationbehavior/vb/source.vb#2)]

value.span: 如果已設定保護層級，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the protection level has been set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已設定 ， 屬性會設定為 `true`。When the is set, the property is set to `true`. 對應至Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的程式設計模型中的屬性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model. 您可以使用 屬性指出這個作業的訊息所需要的特定保護層級。Use the property to indicate that a specific protection level is required by the messages of this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsInitiating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.DefaultValue(false)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示某個方法是否實作了可以在伺服器上初始化工作階段的作業 (若這樣的工作階段存在的話)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method implements an operation that can initiate a session on the server (if such a session exists).

value.span: 如果允許作業在伺服器上初始化工作階段，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operation is permitted to initiate a session on the server, otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制作業是否可在工作階段建立時，成為第一個被呼叫的作業。The property controls whether an operation can be the first operation called when a session is created. > [!NOTE] > 的值必須是 `true`，且使用的繫結必須支援工作階段， 屬性才能正確運作。The value of must be `true` and the binding used must support sessions for the property to work properly. 預設為 `true`，表示作業可成為通道上第一個被呼叫的作業。The default is `true`, which means that an operation can be the first one called on a channel. 除了呼叫此方法，後續對初始化方法的呼叫就不再有效用。Subsequent calls to the initiating method have no effect, other than to call the method. 不會再建立其他工作階段。No other sessions are created. 一般而言，您可將 設為 `false`，強制用戶端在叫用此方法前，先呼叫服務上的另一個方法。Typically, you set to `false` to force clients to call another method on the service before they can invoke this one. 對應至Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的程式設計模型中的屬性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOneWay As Boolean
public: property bool IsOneWay { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出作業是否傳回回覆訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an operation returns a reply message.

value.span: 如果此方法接收要求訊息且不會傳回回覆訊息，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this method receives a request message and returns no reply message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性表示某個作業不會傳回回覆訊息。Use the property to indicate that an operation does not return a reply message. 這種類型的作業對通知或事件型通訊很有用，尤其是雙向通訊。This type of operation is useful for notifications or event-style communication, especially in two-way communication. 若 屬性設為 `false` (預設值)，那麼就算方法的傳回值為 `void`，一樣會產生回覆訊息。If the property is set to `false` (the default), even methods that return `void` result in a reply message. 在此情況下，基礎結構會建立並傳送空白訊息，向呼叫者指出方法已傳回 In this case, the infrastructure creates and sends an empty message to indicate to the caller that the method has returned. 對應至Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的程式設計模型中的屬性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示服務作業在傳送回覆訊息 (如果有的話) 之後，是否導致伺服器關閉該工作階段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service operation causes the server to close the session after the reply message, if any, is sent.

value.span: 如果作業會導致伺服器關閉工作階段，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operation causes the server to close the session, otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，表示呼叫某個服務作業會終止通訊工作階段。Use the property to indicate that calling a service operation terminates the communication session. 對應至Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的程式設計模型中的屬性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *已知型別的*序列化或還原序列化發生時可能存在物件圖形中的類型。The *known types* are types which may be present in an object graph when serialization or deserialization occurs. 如需已知型別的詳細資訊，請參閱[Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。For more information about known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫 <`operation`> WSDL 中的項目名稱。The property overrides the <`operation`> element name in WSDL. 預設作業名稱是實作方法的名稱。The default operation name is the name of the implementing method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會控制是否必須加密、簽章 (或兩者都需要) 作業的訊息。The property controls whether the messages of an operation must be encrypted, signed, or both. 除非較窄的範圍覆寫了此值，否則這裡設定的值，會成為本作業指定的所有訊息的預設值。The value set here is the default value for all messages specified for this operation unless a narrower scope overrides this value. 對應至Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的程式設計模型中的屬性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model. 如果已設定 ， 屬性會設定為 `true`。When the is set, the property is set to `true`.
